member.name: T:GameComposition.Core.Services.DI.ServiceLifetime
member.summary: Defines the lifetime of a registered service.

member.name: F:GameComposition.Core.Services.DI.ServiceLifetime.Singleton
member.summary: Single instance shared across all requests. Use for infrastructure services and stateless objects.

member.name: F:GameComposition.Core.Services.DI.ServiceLifetime.Transient
member.summary: New instance created per request from factory. Use for stateless services that can be safely recreated.

member.name: F:GameComposition.Core.Services.DI.ServiceLifetime.Scoped
member.summary: New instance created per scope/session. Use for services that need isolation (multiplayer scenarios).

member.name: T:GameComposition.Core.Services.DI.ServiceRegistry
member.summary: Core service registry - pure C# implementation with no Godot dependencies. Supports singleton, factory, and scoped service patterns for cross-platform compatibility. Enhanced with lifetime management, health checks, and validation.

member.name: M:GameComposition.Core.Services.DI.ServiceRegistry.RegisterSingleton``2(``1)
member.summary: Registers a singleton service instance that will be shared across all requests. Use sparingly - primarily for infrastructure and read-only services.

member.name: M:GameComposition.Core.Services.DI.ServiceRegistry.RegisterSingleton``1(``0)
member.summary: Registers a singleton service instance that will be shared across all requests. Use sparingly - primarily for infrastructure and read-only services.

member.name: M:GameComposition.Core.Services.DI.ServiceRegistry.RegisterFactory``1(System.Func{``0})
member.summary: Registers a factory function for stateless services that can be safely shared. Creates a new instance on each request but uses the same factory function.

member.name: M:GameComposition.Core.Services.DI.ServiceRegistry.RegisterScoped``1(System.Func{``0})
member.summary: Registers a scoped service factory for per-player or per-session instances. Creates a new instance on each request, ensuring isolation in multiplayer scenarios.

member.name: M:GameComposition.Core.Services.DI.ServiceRegistry.GetService``1
member.summary: Gets a service instance with automatic resolution based on registration type. Singleton: Returns the shared instance Factory: Creates new instance using factory function Scoped: Creates new instance using scoped factory
member.exception: Thrown when service is not registered

member.summary: Tries to get a service instance.
